Title: The Song of Gregory Williams Yates
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Jamie Pachino, Cole Maliska (executive story editor), Mo Masi (story editor), Ryan Maldonado (story editor), Eduardo Javier Canto (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: SVU detectives Olivia Benson and Odafin Tutuola come to Chicago to help find escaped killer Greg Yates.
